DOC.brief_summary: The WHISH trial applies state-of-the science behavioral principle currently available technology deliver physical activity intervention without face-to-face contact ~25,000 old U.S. woman expect consent . It include algorithm-driven interactive voice response ( IVR ) system , build complement National Institute Aging ( NIA ) Go4LifeÂ® Exercise & Physical Activity material 3 , provide tailored advice achieve nationally recommended level PA overcome barrier exercise , mean self-monitoring set personal goal . The intervention build upon evidence-based behavioral science principle intervention component proven effective increase PA old woman , innovative adaptive approach tailor delivery meet individual ( personal ) need .
